title: Quintal
body: Manuel Tomas mentions this family name in his poem aInsulana. In 1662, Diogo da Costa Quintal lived in Funchal, where he founded the chapel of Nossa Senhora das Angústias.

Funchal: Location where Diogo da Costa Quintal lived in 1662.

Diogo da Costa Quintal: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora das Angústias.

1662: Year in which Diogo da Costa Quintal lived in Funchal.
